name: Evil Robots
description:
Robots have been serving humans for decades, but a computer virus has turned them evil.
They have been reprogrammed with a single purpose: kill humans!
There is only one thing you can do: fight back!
How long can you survive against the Evil Robots?

Features:

  • 3 types of robot
  • 7 weapons
  • Dash
  • Infinite levels
  • Local cooperative mode
  • Online cooperative mode
  • Use the medkit to revive your mate
  • Full controller support
  • Two people can play local cooperative with a single keyboard
  • Challenging achievements
